projects.title: Automated Robotic Arm
projects.description: Designed and implemented an automated robotic arm capable of precise movements and object manipulation.

projects.title: Autonomous Drone
projects.description: Developed an autonomous drone equipped with computer vision and obstacle avoidance capabilities.

projects.description: Built a gesture-controlled robot that responds to hand gestures for navigation and task execution.

projects.title: Smart Home Automation System
projects.description: Created a smart home automation system that integrates various electronic devices and enables remote control.

projects.title: Robotic Exoskeleton
projects.description: Designed a robotic exoskeleton for rehabilitation purposes, providing assistance and support to patients.
